application

Class Vertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.Position
      • application.Vertex

  • public class Vertex
extends Position
    A class for representing a vertex and its associated normal. Contains a position and normal vector.
    Author:
    Sam Dark

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double normalX
      The x component of the normal of the vertex
      private double normalY
      The y component of the normal of the vertex
      private double normalZ
      The z component of the normal of the vertex
      private double textureX
      The x texture coord of the vertex
      private double textureY
      The y texture coord of the vertex
      private double textureZ
      The z texture coord of the vertex (should be 0)

      • Fields inherited from class application.Position

        x, y, z

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Vertex()
      Creates a default vertex with position (0,0,0) and normal (0,0,0).
      Vertex(double[] inpVertex, double[] inpNormal)
      Creates a vertex with position defined by inpVertex and normal vector defined by inpNormal
      Vertex(double vX, double vY, double vZ)
      Creates a vertex with a normal of (0,0,0) and position (vX,vY,vZ).
      Vertex(double vX, double vY, double vZ, double nX, double nY, double nZ)
      Creates a vertex with position (vX,vY,vZ) and normal (nX,nY,nZ).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void copyOf(Vertex inpVert)
      Sets the contents of this vertex equal to that of another, essentially making it a copy of the input vertex
      double[] getNormal()
      Gets an array of doubles containing the normal vector x, y and z components
      double[] getTextureCoords()
      Gets an array of doubles containing the texture coordinates x, y and z components
      void setNormal(double[] inpNormal)
      Sets the normal x, y and z to the values in inpNormal
      void setNormal(double nX, double nY, double nZ)
      Sets the normal x, y and z to (nX,nY,nZ)
      void setTextureCoords(Position textureCoords)
      Sets the texture coords x, y and z to the values in inpNormal

        getPosition, getX, getY, getZ, setPosition, setPosition, setX, setY, setZ

    • Constructor Detail

      • Vertex

        Vertex()
        Creates a default vertex with position (0,0,0) and normal (0,0,0).

      • Vertex

        Vertex(double vX,
       double vY,
       double vZ)
        Creates a vertex with a normal of (0,0,0) and position (vX,vY,vZ).
        Parameters:
        vX - The x component of the vertex position
        vY - The y component of the vertex position
        vZ - The z component of the vertex position

      • Vertex

        Vertex(double vX,
       double vY,
       double vZ,
       double nX,
       double nY,
       double nZ)
        Creates a vertex with position (vX,vY,vZ) and normal (nX,nY,nZ).
        Parameters:
        vX - The x component of the vertex position
        vY - The y component of the vertex position
        vZ - The z component of the vertex position
        nX - The x component of the normal vector
        nY - The y component of the normal vector
        nZ - The z component of the normal vector

      • Vertex

        Vertex(double[] inpVertex,
       double[] inpNormal)
        Creates a vertex with position defined by inpVertex and normal vector defined by inpNormal
        Parameters:
        inpVertex - The array of doubles containing the vertex position in the form {x,y,z}
        inpNormal - The array of doubles containing the normal vector in the form {x,y,z}

        public void copyOf(Vertex inpVert)
        Sets the contents of this vertex equal to that of another, essentially making it a copy of the input vertex
        Parameters:
        inpVert - The vertex to copy

        nY - The y component of the normal
        nZ - The z component of the normal

      • setNormal

        public void setNormal(double[] inpNormal)
        Sets the normal x, y and z to the values in inpNormal
        Parameters:
        inpNormal - The array of doubles containing the new normal in the form {x,y,z}

      • getNormal

        public double[] getNormal()
        Gets an array of doubles containing the normal vector x, y and z components
        Returns:
        The array of doubles containing the normal in the form {x,y,z}

      • setTextureCoords

        public void setTextureCoords(Position textureCoords)
        Sets the texture coords x, y and z to the values in inpNormal
        Parameters:
        textureCoords - The Position object containing the new texture coords.

      • getTextureCoords

        public double[] getTextureCoords()
        Gets an array of doubles containing the texture coordinates x, y and z components
        Returns:
        The array of doubles containing the texture coords in the form {x,y,z}
